name: Chicken of Duty - Zombie Apocalypse
description: You are the world's last hope for survival!  The humans have all turned into zombies and now turned their attention towards the animals!  You are the chicken who must fight your way through the hordes of zombies or be the next to be eaten in this simple top down shooter game!  Use WASD to move and point with the mouse and click to shoot, but be careful, your ammo is limited so be as accurate as possible.  The game features a local high score table, so if you would like your score posted against online players, just take a screenshot and contact me, so I can post the high scores manually.
